subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: In 25th place overall in the Giro d’Italia, Lance Armstrong might have to put aside his ambitions of winning a stage to support his 4th-place teammate, Levi Leipheimer.
snippet: In 25th place overall in the Giro d’Italia, Lance Armstrong might have to put aside his ambitions of winning a stage to support his 4th-place teammate, Levi Leipheimer.
